channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 04:42 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 04:42 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 04:35 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.

item.title: 游리 04:35 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Pokrovska territorial community- Chervonohryhorivska territorial community
item.description: 游리 04:35 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region.
